title: JSON schema for Vtec generator files

resources.description: List of resources identified by unique name.

.*.description: Unique resource name. Should be on plural snake_case format, ex. monsters, monster_children, etc. This unique name will be used inside API URL calls and ui client router slug.

label.description: Localized label of resource. Will be shown on menus and page titles.

icon.description: Icon of resource for menus and list pages. Should be a supported mdi icon (mdi-account, etc.).

actions.description: Optional supported crud operations, do not set if you want all by default.

columns.description: Fields that should be shown on datagrid list. Cell format will be adapted according to field type (cf 'fields' property section).

sortable.description: Fields that can be sortable on list page.

searchable.description: List of searchable fields for global list search. Disabled if not setted.

filterable.description: Fields that can be filtered individualy. Will appear on advanced filter on list page. Input will be adapted according to field type (cf 'fields' property section).

include.description: Related resources to include on list page with eager-loading.
